description:
The evolution of a best-selling boot from Vasque. With added venting and the breathability of VasqueDry® technology, they allow water vapour to escape while keeping showers and muddy ground from soaking through. They are great for day hiking and burly enough for fast and light backpacking over moderate terrain.

  • Uppers are waterproof nubuck leather with breathable recycled polyester mesh
  • VasqueDry® waterproof membrane keeps water out while allowing exceptional breathability
  • Arc Tempo+ last has an asymmetric curve and medium volume heel that fits higher arches well
  • Tapered toe box and slightly rockered construction provide a natural gait on uneven, technical trails
  • Rubber toe bumpers protect the boot and your toes
  • Footbeds are dual density EVA
  • Enduralast Bio EVA midsoles with moulded TPU plate chassis for torsional rigidity and support
  • Outsoles are grippy non-marking rubber
name: Vasque Breeze Hiking Boots - Men's
